panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for process, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Process Latency

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for poll, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Poll Latency

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for commit, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Commit Latency

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for punctuate, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Punctuate Latency

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for process, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Task Process Latency

panels.description: The average number of enforced processings per second for this task.
panels.title: Enforced Processing Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for commit, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Commit Latency

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for poll, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Record Lateness

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for punctuate, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Punctuate Latency

panels.description: The fraction of time the thread spent on processing this active task among all assigned active tasks.
panels.title: Active Process Ratio

panels.description: The average number of records dropped within this task.
panels.title: Dropped Record Rate

panels.description:
The total number of records processed by a source node.

The total number of records that have been emitted downstream from suppression operation nodes. Compare with the process-total metric(Records Processed) to determine how many updates are being suppressed.
The average number of records processed per second by a source node.
panels.title: Process Rate

panels.description: The rate at which records that have been emitted downstream from suppression operation nodes. Compare with the process-rate metric to determine how many updates are being suppressed.
panels.title: Suppression Emit Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for commit, across all running tasks of this thread.
panels.title: Record e2e Latency

panels.description: The [average | minimum | maximum] cache hit ratio defined as the ratio of cache read hits over the total cache read requests.
panels.title: Record Cache Hit Ratio

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for put state operation.
panels.title: Put Latency

panels.description: The average rate of put state operations per second for this store.
panels.title: Put Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for put state if absent operation.

targets.legendFormat: Max State Put If Absent Latency - {{thread_id}} - {{task_id}} - {{rocksdb_state_id}}
Avg State Put If Absent Latency - {{thread_id}} - {{task_id}} - {{rocksdb_state_id}}

panels.title: Put If Absent Latency

panels.description: The average rate of put state if absent operations per second for this store.
panels.title: Put If Absent Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for get state operation.
panels.title: Get Latency

panels.description: The average rate of get state operations per second for this store.
panels.title: Get Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for delete state operation.
panels.title: Delete Latency

panels.description: The average rate of delete state operations per second for this store.
panels.title: Delete Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for put all state operation.
panels.title: Put All Latency

panels.description: The average rate of put all state operations per second for this store.
panels.title: Put All Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for all state operation.
panels.title: All Latency

panels.description: The average rate of all state operations per second for this store.
panels.title: All Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for range state operation.
panels.title: Range Latency

panels.description: The average rate of range state operations per second for this store.
panels.title: Range Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for flush state operation.
panels.title: Flush Latency

panels.description: The average rate of state flush operations per second for this store.
panels.title: Flush Rate

panels.description: The average and max execution time in ms, for restore state operation.
panels.title: Restore Latency

panels.description: The average rate of state restore operations per second for this store.
panels.title: Restore Rate

panels.description:
The number of current open files.

The total number of file errors that occurred.
The average number of bytes written per second to the RocksDB state store.
panels.title: Bytes Written Rate

panels.description: The average number of bytes read per second from the RocksDB state store.
panels.title: Bytes Read Rate

panels.description: The average number of bytes flushed per second from the memtable to disk.
panels.title: Memtable Bytes Flushed Rate

panels.description: The ratio of memtable hits, relative to all lookups to the memtable.
panels.title: Memtable Hit Ratio

panels.description: The ratio of block cache hits for data blocks, relative to all lookups for data blocks to the block cache.
panels.title: Block Cache Data Hit Ratio

panels.description: The ratio of block cache hits for index blocks, relative to all lookups for index blocks to the block cache.
panels.title: Block Cache Index Hit Ratio

panels.description: The ratio of block cache hits for filter blocks, relative to all lookups for filter blocks to the block cache.
panels.title: Block Cache Filter Hit Ratio

panels.description: The average number of bytes read per second during compaction.
panels.title: Bytes Read Compaction Rate

panels.description: The average duration of write stalls, in ms.
panels.title: Avg Write Stall Duration

panels.description: The total number of bytes read per second during compaction.
panels.title: Total Write Stall Duration

panels.description: The number of immutable memtables that have not yet been flushed.
panels.title: Unflushed Immutable Memtables

panels.description: The approximate size of the active memtable in bytes.
panels.title: Active Memtable size

panels.description: The approximate size of active and unflushed immutable memtables in bytes.
panels.title: All Memtable size

panels.description: The approximate size of active, unflushed immutable, and pinned immutable memtables in bytes.
panels.title: Memtable size

panels.description: The number of entries in the active memtable.
panels.title: Active Memtable entries

panels.description: The number of entries in the unflushed immutable memtables.
panels.title: Immutable Memtable entries

panels.description: The number of delete entries in the active memtable.
panels.title: Active Memtable Delete entries

panels.description: The number of delete entries in the unflushed immutable memtables.
panels.title: Immutable Memtable Delete entries

panels.description: This metric reports 1 if a memtable flush is pending, otherwise it reports 0.
panels.title: Memtable Pending Flush

panels.description: The number of currently running flushes.
panels.title: Flushes

panels.description: This metric reports 1 if at least one compaction is pending, otherwise it reports 0.
panels.title: Compaction Pending

panels.description: The number of currently running compactions.
panels.title: Compactions
